SEARCH
Module ingsw.codex_naturalis
Package ingsw.codex_naturalis.model.cards

Class HandCard

java.lang.Object
ingsw.codex_naturalis.model.cards.HandCard
Direct Known Subclasses:
GoldCard, InitialCard, ResourceCard
public abstract class HandCard extends Object
HandCard's class This class represents one single card that a player could have in his hand at any game's turn. A card has a front and a back and the player can see both in order to choose which side to play. ( Once the player has chosen a side and plays it, it can't change it anymore.) -> DA VERIFICARE COME IMPLEMENTARE QUESTA PARTE TRA PARENTESI
